scripts.compile: npx hardhat clean; npx hardhat compile
scripts.deploy_t:rinkeby: NETWORK=rinkeby npx hardhat run --network rinkeby scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploy_t:mainnet: NETWORK=mainnet npx hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploy_v:rinkeby: NETWORK=rinkeby npx hardhat run --network rinkeby scripts/deploy_vesting.js
scripts.deploy_v:mainnet: NETWORK=mainnet npx hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/deploy_vesting.js
